subSections.title: Translingual
subSections.text: {{stroke order|type=animate}}

subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text: {{Han char|rn=146|rad=西|as=00|sn=6|four=10600|canj=MCW|ids=⿱一𠁤}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: 西 is the 146th radical of the Chinese dictionary. In its few compounds it most often appears at the top in the form 覀 as in [[覄]]. It is important to distinguish it from [[襾]] and [[酉]].

subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text:
* [[Index:Chinese_radical/西]]
* [[𪎢]]

subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text: {{zh-forms|alt=㢴}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – a [[bag]] or [[basket]], borrowed for phonetic value. Compare {{och-l|東|bundle > east}}. Traditionally explained as a pictogram of a bird settling into its nest, which by analogy with the setting of the sun means “west”. This etymology has been disputed ({{zh-ref|Sears}}), but {{zh-ref|Sagart (2004)}} stands by it.

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=2|rs=西00}}

# [[west]]
# [[Europe]], [[European]]
# ''kanji used to transliterate foreign languages''
# {{short for|lang=ja|西班牙|tr=Supein|nodot=1|sort=すへいん}}: [[Spain]], [[Spanish]]
# [[autumn]]

subSections.title: Readings
subSections.text:
{{ja-readings
|goon=さい
|kanon=せい
|toon=すい
|kun=にし-
|nanori=あき, いり, かわち<かはち
}}

subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|にし|yomi=k}}
From adnominal {{m|ja|往にし|tr=inishi||[[leave|leaving]], [[pass]]ing}}, as the direction of ''[[sunset]]''. {{rfv-etymology|ja}}

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|にし|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR,SMK2}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Idioms
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|西 向く 侍|にし むく さむらい|rom=-}} → {{ja-r|二四 六九 士|にし むく さむらい|[[westward]]-facing [[samurai]] → mnemonic for months with less than 31 days, with {{m|ja|士}} standing for {{m|ja|十一}}}}

subSections.title: Proverbs
Proper noun
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|しゃー|yomi=irr|sort=しやあ}}
Possibly a corruption of {{bor|ja|cmn|sort=しやあ|西|tr=xī||[[west]]}}.

subSections.title: Noun
See also
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|風%牌|かぜ%ハイ|[[wind]] [[tile]]s}}: {{ja-r|東|トン|[[east wind]]}}, {{ja-r|南|ナン|[[south wind]]}}, {{ja-r|西|シャー|west wind}}, {{ja-r|北|ペー|[[north wind]]}}
